trans-unit.source: This module allows you to accept payments by check.
trans-unit.target: Aquest mòdul us permet acceptar sempre pagaments amb xec.

trans-unit.source: If the client chooses this payment method, the order status will change to 'Waiting for payment'.
trans-unit.target: Si el client tria aquesta forma de pagament, l'estat de la comanda canviarà a "Esperant el pagament".

trans-unit.source: You will need to manually confirm the order as soon as you receive a check.
trans-unit.target: Per tant, haureu de confirmar manualment la comanda tan aviat com rebeu un xec.
